name: Let me speak from my heart

metadata.name: Squirrel
metadata.description:
This painting is about the imprint of the thieves' culture on the Russian mentality. The birch grove here is a symbol of Russian nature, and the squirrel is its inhabitant. In Russian thieves slang "Belochka" (squirrel in Russian) is the name of delirium tremens.
.
Oil on canvas
60x90 cm
2021
.
When NFT will be sold, I will burn the physical canvas. I going to share the action process on social networks and send the video personally to the collector. 
The painting will become part of the metaverse.
